ds_id: Sharper & Granite LLC Trims Stock Position in Meta Platforms, Inc. (NASDAQ:META)@MarketBeat@2023-06-25 15:34:30.699118@Meta
data_content: During Q1, Sharper & Granite LLC reduced its position in Meta Platforms, Inc. by 17.0%, selling 515 shares to reduce its holdings to 2,506 shares, worth $531,000. Worth Asset Management and Rise Advisors increased their Meta holdings by 248.6% and 59.3% respectively, while Riverpoint Wealth Management, Ruedi Wealth Management, and MBM Wealth Consultants all acquired new positions. Insider activity at Meta included the sale of company stock by COO Javier Olivan and insider Jennifer Newstead. Analysts have set new price targets for Meta, most of them increasing their targets, and the company maintains a "Moderate Buy" rating. The company reported Q1 revenue of $28.65 billion, beating estimates by over a billion.
